cards.name: "AAA Video Game Man"
cards.text:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
"AAA Video Game Man" can't attack or block alone.

cards.flavor: The problem isn't the indrik's enthusiasm, it's Ravnica's lack of guardrails.
cards.name: Affectionate Indrik
cards.text: When Affectionate Indrik enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

cards.name: "Air-traffic Control Lizard"
cards.text: "Air-traffic Control Lizard" has double strike as long as you control a Gate.

cards.name: Arboretum Elemental
cards.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of the creature's color.)
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.flavor: Some storms never die.
cards.name: Arclight Phoenix
cards.text:
Flying, haste
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you cast 3 or more instants and/or sorceries this turn, you may return Arclight Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Dimir assassinations are choreographed like dance routines. Each challenge is anticipated and countered with graceful ease.
cards.name: Artful Takedown
cards.text:
Choose one or both -
• Tap target creature.
• Target creature gets -2/-4 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: A power vacuum for the Azorius. A keepsake for Vraska.
cards.name: Assassin's Trophy
cards.text: Destroy target permanent an opponent controls. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.

cards.flavor: When the Erstwhile were unearthed from their tombs, they became a ready-made army for Vraska.
cards.name: Attendant of Vraska
cards.text: When Attendant of Vraska dies, if you control a Vraska planeswalker, you gain life equal to Attendant of Vraska's power.

cards.name: "Aurelia, With the Good Hair"
cards.text:
Flying
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose up to one creature you control. Until end of turn, that creature gets +2/+0, gains trample if it's red, and gains vigilance if it's white.

cards.flavor: "Don't stop till your horns come out their back."
cards.name: Barging Sergeant
cards.text:
Haste
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

cards.flavor: "The tiniest mouse speaks louder to me than all the festival crowds on Tin Street."
cards.name: Beast Whisperer
cards.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

cards.flavor: "Watch carefully. The gap between death and victory is thinner than your blade."
cards.name: Blade Instructor
cards.text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

cards.flavor: "Send your champion. I could use a light workout."
cards.name: Boros Challenger
cards.text:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
{2}{R}{W}: Boros Challenger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"The more trust breaks down, the more we must throw open the front gates."
—Aurelia
cards.name: Boros Guildgate
cards.text:
Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

cards.flavor:
"We pass these along to our fellow soldiers to recognize deeds of valor. It won't stay with you for long."
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage
cards.name: Boros Locket
cards.text:
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}, {T}, Sacrifice Boros Locket: Draw two cards.

cards.flavor: "Lately I've seen the biggest bounties of my career—and for the biggest names."
cards.name: Bounty Agent
cards.text:
Vigilance
{T}, Sacrifice Bounty Agent: Destroy target legendary permanent that's an artifact, creature, or enchantment.

cards.flavor: "My speciality is theoretical universal limits and ways to circumvent them."
cards.name: Chemister's Insight
cards.text:
Draw two cards.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

cards.flavor: By guild tradition, any puddle of multicolored light on the cobblestones can serve as neutral ground.
cards.name: Chromatic Lantern
cards.text:
Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor: All those who trade in questions must answer to the Dimir.
cards.name: Citywatch Sphinx
cards.text:
Flying
When Citywatch Sphinx dies, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)

cards.flavor: "Because of Niv-Mizzet's disappearance, Ral took charge of the guild. He had dreamed of this day, but he felt like a pawn in someone else's game."
cards.name: Command the Storm
cards.text: Command the Storm deals 5 damage to target creature.

cards.name: Conclave Guildmage
cards.text:
{G}, {T}: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
{5}{W}, {T}: Create a 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature token with vigilance.

Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
When Conclave Tribunal enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Conclave Tribunal leaves the battlefield.

cards.flavor: "I've seen your house, and you've been a lovely, if unwitting, host. But at last it's time for farewells."

cards.text: As long as you've surveilled this turn, Darkblade Agent has deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."

cards.name: Deadly Visit
cards.text:
Destroy target creature.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

"Commander, what's the signal to attack?"
"You'll know."

cards.flavor:

—Lazav

cards.flavor: "The route is direct but challenging. Incidentally, how are you with heights?"

cards.text:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
Whenever "Don't Mess with The Reckoner" is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target player.

cards.flavor: The sound of every twisted secret tempts you to hear another.

cards.text:

Flash

cards.flavor: "Whatever hatred destroys, a single act of trust can revive."
cards.name: Emmara, Soul of the Accord
cards.text: Whenever Emmara, Soul of the Accord becomes tapped, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

cards.flavor:
"The League accepts no responsibility for former members and the damage they may cause."

cards.name: Erratic Cyclops

Trample
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Erratic Cyclops gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a charge counter on Firemind's Research.

{1}{R}, Remove five charge counters from Firemind's Research: It deals 5 damage to any target.

cards.flavor:
"Hold on to your ideals. They'll be tested more than your armor or the edge of your blade."
—Tajic
cards.name: Fresh-Faced Recruit
cards.text: As long as it's your turn, Fresh-Faced Recruit has first strike.

cards.flavor: The Chamber of the Guildpact stands as a reminder that even the bitterest struggles can end in cooperation.

Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor:

Defender
Whenever you surveil, put a +1/+1 counter on Thoughtbound Phantasm.
As long as Thoughtbound Phantasm has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

cards.flavor: "It's truly the highest honor, isn't it? To be remembered? Pity for you."
cards.name: Thought Erasure
cards.text:
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

cards.flavor: "You've strayed, overworlder."
cards.name: Underrealm Lich
cards.text:
If you would draw a card, instead look at the top three cards of your library, then put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Pay 4 life: Underrealm Lich gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

cards.flavor: The first thing the mist chills is the mind. Victims never cry out or even murmur in surprise.
cards.name: Unexplained Disappearance
cards.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

cards.flavor: Golgari crops bloom in strange soil, touched only by long-traveled light.
cards.name: Vivid Revival
cards.text: Return up to three target multicolor cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Vivid Revival.

cards.name: Vraska, Golgari Queen
cards.text:
+2: You may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
-3: Destroy target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 3 or less.
-9: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game."

cards.name: Vraska, Regal Gorgon
cards.text:
+2: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. That creature gains menace until end of turn.
-3: Destroy target creature.
-10: For each creature card in your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

cards.name: Vraska's Stoneglare
cards.text: Destroy target creature. You gain life equal to its toughness. You may search your library and/or graveyard from a card named Vraska, Regal Gorgon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

cards.flavor:
"Be like the grazers of the Saruli. Keep your herd close, and stay alert for encroaching danger."
—Lalia, Selesnya dryad
cards.name: Wary Okapi
cards.text: Vigilance

cards.flavor: Few believe Duskmantle exists. Fewer find it. None live to bear witness.
cards.name: Watery Grave
cards.text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Watery Grave enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor: He has a job to finish, and it's you.
cards.name: Whisper Agent
cards.text:
Flash
When Whisper Agent enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

cards.flavor: "Sure, I hear things. I hear plenty. But how am I to talk with this parched throat?"
cards.name: Whispering Snitch
cards.text: Whenever you surveil for the first time each turn, Whispering Snitch deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

cards.name: "Your Centaur Valentine"
cards.text: When "Your Centaur Valentine" enters the battlefield, each player gains 4 life.
